 void ftpClose()
          close ftp connect
 boolean ftpConnect(java.lang.String serverIP, int port, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String ftpDir)
          connect to ftp, if connect successfully, return true, else return false connect time out is 20 seconds

          download files from ftp to local dir

ftpConnect

boolean ftpConnect(java.lang.String serverIP,
                   int port,
                   java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   java.lang.String ftpDir)
connect to ftp, if connect successfully, return true, else return false connect time out is 20 seconds

serverIP -
port -
username -
password -
ftpDir - child dir in the ftp

endfix - filter file by endfix
isListDir - is list dir

boolean ftpUpload(java.lang.String srcFileAddr,

upload one file to ftp

参数：
srcFileAddr -
ftpFileName - file name in the ftp, if is null, it's the same to origin file name
返回：

ftpUpload

boolean ftpUpload(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> files)
upload multi files to ftp

参数：
files - 0 is origin file address, 1 is new file name in ftp, if is null, then it's the same to origin file name
返回：

ftpDownload

参数：
files - 0 is file name in the ftp to download, 1 is dest address to store downloaded file
